class_notes: This section is for MN Pathway to MSN semester 1 students only.
course_description: Normal physiology and disordered physiologic processes that lead to disease or injury for selected health problems will be discussed. Students will translate their knowledge of pathophysiology to the clinical setting, making decisions for health promotion, risk reduction and disease management.
schedule_location: TW 8am-9:50am in Nursing Learning Ctr, Rm 225
sections: Class Nbr: 1742, Section #: 400, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TW 8-9:50a, Instructor: L. Patterson, Status: Open
